summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 726 m), feels like temperature (up 1.6°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 774.1m higher than yesterday, 134.5m lower than the past week, 725.6m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 765m minimum and 2220m maximum, with an average of 2040m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2170m and 2770m.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, the air will feel quite humid. Possible light showers, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
